headline: Was Jim Cramer Right About Nucor Corporation (NUE)?
summary: We recently published a list of 13 Stock Predictions That Jim Cramer Got Completely Wrong. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Nucor Corporation (NYSE:NUE) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses.
